name: Driving Blind (tamdevs)
description:
Driving Blind Made for Ludum Dare 49

THEY SAID HE WAS "TOO BLIND TO DRIVE"

WHAT A LOAD OF PHOOEY!

Help your blind friend in need of personal transportation attain a license by telling him the direction to turn over a hidden earpiece in real-time!

Show the system that they don't who they're messing with!

The need for individual freedom outweighs the need for community safety!

Yee-Haw!

------------------------------------------------------------------

Traverse through wacky, cartoony levels whilst avoiding traffic cones, barriers, lamps etc. You'll be graded once you get to the finish line based on how many obstacles you hit.

Controls:

A/D or left/right or gamepad left/right to turn the car.

R to restart if necessary.

Made by:

@sullysaysyes

@tamdevs
